name: Impact Physics and Lock-on Adjustments
description: Adds ragdoll impact to briefcases and thrown items, and options to disable lock-on for grenades, explosives and similar items.

options.name: No Lock-on | Grenades & Proximity Items
options.tooltip: Turn off lock-on for throwing grenades and proximity explosives / items, including things like the chloroform flask and the durian.

options.name: No Lock-on | Remote Explosives & Items
options.tooltip: Turn off lock-on for throwing remote explosives and other remote items like the remote taser

options.name: Faster throw - Charc0al's Recommendation
options.tooltip: Most briefcases: 47 strength | Common (leather, military) briefcases: Human strength | Sieger 300 Briefcase: Extreme | Purple Briefcase: Ridiculous | Chinese Briefcase: TO THE MOON

options.name: Faster throw - Human strength
options.tooltip: Throw briefcases at the same speed as other thrown items, hits with more realistic impact force.

options.name: Faster throw - 47 strength
options.tooltip: Throw briefcases at world class assassin strength. Normal item throw speed, with an amount of knockback that feels like it belongs in vanilla WoA.

options.name: Faster throw - Extreme strength
options.tooltip: Hits just hard enough to send NPCs over Whittleton Creek fences.

options.name: Faster throw - Actually Ridiculous strength
options.tooltip: Throw briefcases at superhuman speed and send NPCs flying.

options.name: Faster throw - TO THE MOON
options.tooltip: No one in their right mind would choose this option.

options.name: Impact Force | KO Items
options.tooltip: Adds ragdoll impact force to KO items. Each item has it's own impact force based on what feels natural for the items of different weights.

options.name: Impact Force | Lethal Items
options.tooltip: Adds ragdoll impact force to LETHAL items. Each item has it's own impact force based on what feels natural for the items of different weights.

options.name: Throw HUD | Dot Reticle
options.tooltip: Changes the thrown object reticle into a dot

options.name: Loadout | Common Throwables
options.tooltip: (Peacock required) Adds some fun common items to the loadout screen including Frying Pan, Propane Flask, Chloroform, Brick, and a few more
